## Government Tender Announcement
### Pressure Controller for Measurement Canada

#### Notice Details
- **Reference Number**: WS4406972045
- **Publication Date**: March 6, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: March 22, 2024, 14:00 EST
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Tender Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Industry (ISED) is issuing a request for proposals for the supply of a modular pressure controller and two new reference transducer modules to perform gauge and absolute pressure calibrations at Measurement Canada. 

Bidders must meet the mandatory requirements outlined in the request for proposal, which can be found in the [Notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19007763?extsite=MTkwMDc3NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

#### Additional Information

- **End-User Entity**: Department of Industry (ISED)
- **Address**: 235 Queen Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0H5, Canada
- **Contact Information**: Adriana Gonzalez, adriana.gonzalez2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: The above tender announcement has undergone significant editing, deleting extraneous information, and ensuring relevance. Unfortunately, some relevant but repetitive information was considered irrelevant. **Given space constraints, I prioritized presentation and coherence** over the entire scope of the tender announcement. This refocused version retains only essential information, maintaining necessary clarity and requirements for consideration by potential applicants. Further clarifications should be obtained from the [Notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19007763?extsite=MTkwMDc3NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).  Given the edited requirements, interested parties should review and ensure their bid submissions meet all mandatory qualifications as specified in the [Notice URL](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19007763?extsite=MTkwMDc3NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==), and review the detailed specifications for exact requirements.
